content:
I'll have to be on a mini-vacation around rustfest (which is next week), likely starting this week, so I might not make it to the next couple week's meetings.
(also I'm not sure what dates y'all had in mind for the polonius work week ?)
I pencilled in something around November 8th and up and including the weekend, but I'm quite flexible
Err, we just changed to DST here, which means I am now confused about when the meetings are. When are they, and in what timezone?
usually we go by US Time, or more specifically whatever the calendar event says I guess :)
but that's partly because I make the calendar events :muahahahahha:

usually we go by US Time, or more specifically whatever the calendar event says I guess :)

Isn't there two US times?
most US jurisdictions change at the same time, but I'm sure there are exceptions
and of course the US spans 3 time zones...
